page_content:
Pipeline
Seagen is developing and advancing a new generation of targeted treatments to advance 
cancer care. We designed our pipeline with our patients in mind, focusing on therapies that 
have the potential to address significant unmet medical needs.
RESEARCH IN DEVELOPMENT MARKETED2021/2022 Research  
Areas of Focus
• Proprietary ADC technologies
• Immunotherapies to innate and adaptive 
immune targets
• New classes of ADCs that incorporate novel 
small molecule payloads designed to kill 
tumor cells and induce an anti-tumor 
immune response
• Novel antibody engineering technologies
• ADCs in combination with checkpoint 
inhibitors
• Additional targeted cancer therapeutics Early-Stage Pipeline Assets
Late-Stage Pipeline Assets
